about.title: About Me
body: At the Keio University SFC Research Institute I build efficient, high-performance inference stacks for large language models, spanning theoretical work through HPC-oriented systems design.
I unwind with soccer, music (guitar / piano / bass / drums), and time with cats.
Open to RA roles, internships, and collaborative research proposals.
